content: @spacekookie Hey, I looked into issue of barrel not working with diesel. It's this one https://github.com/rust-db/barrel/issues/96. What do you think about allow multiple database support?

Barrel is not the issue here, it can support multiple databases, it's the interface to diesel that's the issue.

The diesel devs didn't want the footprint of the barrel interface to be too big and getting this info from Dieser is hard. The only thing I could imagine is defining some side-channel for this.

The current api was a bit of a compromise.

~k

/ sent from k9 on mobile / sorry for any bad formatting /
